label: === DOCUMENT METADATA ===
help_text: Information about the source document

label: Document ID
help_text: Unique identifier (e.g. DOC-2024-001)

label: Document type
help_text: Classification of the source material
options: Official Government|News Article|Academic Paper|NGO Report|Legal Text|Speech/Statement|Other

label: Publication date
help_text: When the document was published or released

label: Source name
help_text: Publication or organization name

label: URL/Reference
help_text: Web link or archival reference

label: Original language
help_text: Language of the source document

label: Page count
help_text: Total pages (0 if not applicable)

label: === CONTENT CODING ===
help_text: Systematic coding of document content

label: Primary topic
help_text: Main subject matter of the document
options: Electoral Reform|Constitutional Change|Economic Policy|Social Policy|Foreign Policy|Environment|Human Rights|Security|Other

label: Secondary topic
help_text: Additional subject if applicable
options: None|Electoral Reform|Constitutional Change|Economic Policy|Social Policy|Foreign Policy|Environment|Human Rights|Security|Other

label: Government actors mentioned?
help_text: Does document reference government officials or bodies?

label: Civil society actors?
help_text: Does document reference NGOs or citizen groups?

label: International actors?
help_text: Does document reference foreign governments or international organizations?

label: Overall sentiment
help_text: Tone of the document toward the main topic

label: Stance on reform
help_text: Position expressed regarding institutional change

label: Evidence presented
help_text: Type of supporting material in document
options: Statistical data|Case studies|Expert opinion|Historical precedent|None|Multiple types

label: === QUALITY ASSESSMENT ===
help_text: Evaluate source reliability and relevance

label: Source credibility
help_text: Reliability of the publication/author

label: Apparent bias
help_text: Degree of partisan or ideological slant

label: Relevance to project
help_text: How useful is this for the research question?

label: Key excerpt
help_text: Most important quote or passage (with page number)

label: Coder notes
help_text: Any issues difficulties or observations during coding

label: Coding confidence
help_text: How confident are you in these codings?

label: Flag for review?
help_text: Should a second coder verify this document?
